src:
Steelseries predstavlja novo gaming miško Sensei ten

05 Nov 2019, 08:00











Sensei Ten, najnovejša gaming miška s TrueMove Pro senzorjem

SteelSeries, eden izmed vodilnih proizvajalcev na področju igričarskih perifernih enot, je v začetku oktobra predstavil Sensei Ten, najnovejšo gaming miško s TrueMove Pro senzorjem. Originalni model Sensei velja za enega najbolj ikoničnih in razširjenih v e-športih. Sensei Ten, katere ime izhaja iz japonske besede za božansko, uteleša svoje poslanstvo v ikonični obliki, a z novimi izboljšavami.

Nadgrajena legenda

Že več kot deset let SteelSeries Sensei s svojo ikonično obliko in zmogljivostjo definira meje gaming mišk. Njena obojeročna oblika je bila pogosto poustvarjena, vendar se do sedaj nobeni drugi miški ni uspelo približati originalni SteelSeries Sensei, ki je postala tako zelo priljubljena med gamerji. Sensei Ten tako ohranja že znano Sensei obliko, a jo nadgradi z novim

TrueMove Pro senzorjem, ki je kot nalašč za tekmovalno igričarstvo.

TrueMove Pro sensor je najnovejši optični senzor, ki je rezultat sodelovanja SteelSeries in PixArt. TrueMove Pro z lahkoto prekosi svoje tekmece na katerikoli podlagi zahvaljujoč svoji True 1:1 sledljivosti, 18 000 CPI in 450 IPS. Napredna preciznost onemogoča napačno sledenje manevrov pod kotom, sunkovitih gibov in hitrega klikanja. TrueMove Pro združuje PixArt-ova leta izkušenj z oblikovanjem senzorjev in SteelSeries-ovo poslanstvo, da zagotovi najboljšo možno sledljivost, zaradi česar je TrueMove Pro najboljši senzor na kakršnikoli podlagi.
»Kot večina igričarjev sem tudi sam skozi leta preizkusil veliko mišk. S Sensei-jem sem končno našel popolnost,« pravi Sébastien »Ceb« Debs iz ekipe OG. Ceb in OG so letos pisali zgodovino kot prva ekipa, ki je zmagala na dveh zaporednih »The International«, tekmovanjih v Doti 2, kjer je Ceb obakrat slavil s Sensei miško.
Ergonomska in obojeročna oblika Sensei Ten zagotavlja udoben in naraven občutek za levičarje in desničarje ne glede na način oprijema. Osem gumbov in univerzalno ohišje še bolj pripomoreta k hitri menjavi oprijemov. Sensei Ten se ponaša s 5 CPI vgrajenim spominom, ki omogoča shranjevanje nastavitev, 60 milijoni mehanskih stikal za konsistentno natančnost klikanja, 2-zonsko RGB osvetljavo in visokokakovostnim polimernim ohišjem za leta uporabe.

O SteelSeries

SteelSeries, ki je bilo ustanovljeno leta 2001, je že vrsto let eden izmed vodilnih proizvajalcev igričarskih perifernih enot, ki se osredotoča na kvaliteto, inovativnost in funkcionalnost. Prav tako je nahitrejše rastoča znamka gaming slušalk v ZDA.
SteelSeries konstantno izboljšuje zmogljivost svojih izdelkov s svojimi inovacijami in tehnologijo, ki omogoča igričarjem, da igrajo bolje, trenirajo dlje in presegajo cilje. Je pionir v podpiranju tekmovalnih gaming turnirjev in e-športov in omogoča medsebojno povezovanje ter spodbuja občutek pripadnosti med igričarji.
Pri oblikovanju in izdelavi vsakega izdelka SteelSeries tesno sodeluje z ekipo profesionalnih in ljubiteljskih igričarjev, ki predstavljajo vodilno silo podjetja.
Za več informacij o izdelkih in partnerjih SteelSeries obiščite www.SteelSeries.com. Za najnovejše novice sledite na socialnih omrežjih na http://facebook.com/steelseries in na Twitterju @SteelSeries.
text:
Steelseries introduces the new Sensei Ten gaming mouse

05 Nov 2019, 08:00











Sensei Ten, the latest gaming mouse with a TrueMove Pro sensor

SteelSeries, one of the leading manufacturers of gaming peripherals, introduced Sensei Ten, the latest gaming mouse with a TrueMove Pro sensor, in early October. The original Sensei model is considered one of the most iconic and widespread in e-sports. Sensei Ten, whose name is derived from the Japanese word for divine, embodies its mission in iconic form, but with new improvements.

An upgraded legend

For over ten years SteelSeries Sensei has been defining the boundaries of gaming mice with its iconic design and performance. Its two-handed design has often been recreated, but so far no other mouse has been able to get close to the original SteelSeries Sensei, which has become so popular with gamers. Sensei Ten retains the already familiar Sensei shape, but upgrades to a new one

TrueMove Pro sensor, perfect for competitive gaming.

The TrueMove Pro sensor is the latest optical sensor resulting from the collaboration of SteelSeries and PixArt. TrueMove Pro easily outperforms its competitors on any basis thanks to its True 1: 1 traceability, 18,000 CPI and 450 IPS. Advanced precision prevents erroneous tracking of angled maneuvers, jerky movements and quick clicks. TrueMove Pro combines PixArt's years of sensor design experience with SteelSeries's mission to provide the best traceability possible, making TrueMove Pro the best sensor on any basis.
“Like most gamers, I have tried many mice myself over the years. With Sensei, I finally found perfection, "says Sébastien" Ceb "Debs of OG. Ceb and OG have made history this year as the first team to win two consecutive "The International" Dota 2 competitions, where Ceb celebrated with a Sensei mouse.
The ergonomic and double-sided Sensei Ten design provides a comfortable and natural feel for left and right-handers regardless of their grip. Eight buttons and a universal housing make it even faster for quick grip changes. The Sensei Ten boasts 5 CPI built-in memory that saves settings, 60 million mechanical switches for consistent click accuracy, 2-zone RGB illumination and a high-quality polymer housing for years of use.

About SteelSeries

Founded in 2001, SteelSeries has been one of the leading manufacturers of gaming peripherals for many years, focusing on quality, innovation and functionality. It is also the fastest growing brand of gaming headphones in the US.
SteelSeries is constantly improving the performance of its products with its innovations and technology that allows gamers to play better, train longer and exceed goals. It is a pioneer in supporting competitive gaming tournaments and e-sports, facilitating interconnection and promoting a sense of belonging among gamers.
In designing and producing each product, SteelSeries works closely with a team of professional and amateur gamers to represent the company's driving force.
For more information on SteelSeries products and partners, visit www.SteelSeries.com. For the latest news, follow on social media at http://facebook.com/steelseries and on Twitter @SteelSeries.
